oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 7838, 7841, 23. 8068 rev., 8070 rev., 25. 8260 rev., 32. 8811rev., 8875 rev.). Names of Trees and Plants, and other information regarding them, given partly in Bushman by and partly in English after /han≠kass’o. (L VIII.

7833, 7835, 7847, 23. 8061 rev., 8062 rev. and 8063 rev., 8073 rev., 29. 8601 rev., 8606 rev., 8613 rev., 30. 8637 rev., 31. 8728 rev., 8790, 8791, 8789 rev.). |han≠kass'o provides the names of various plants and animals found in Bushmanland, as well as notes on how they are used, and details about and descriptions of them.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Names of plants and animals and notes on their use
